name: Welcome & Eligibility Triage
description: Confirm service history, current rating, and goals while educating on VA math, ITF, and fully developed claims.

name: ROI/Offer & Secure Checkout
description: Show projected impact, collect deposit, and trigger Zoho Sign for contract and ROI pack.

name: Account Setup & Portal Orientation
description: Create the secure account and orient the veteran to documents, timeline, and the tracker controls.

name: DD-214 & ITF
description: Guide DD-214 retrieval and ITF filing with timers and checklists.

name: Service & Medical Records Intake
description: Request STRs, collect civilian medical records, and track missing artifacts.

name: Intake Interview (Self-guided or Live)
description: Structured interview with optional live scheduling and enforced note quality standards.

name: MDBQs via Zoho Forms
description: Embedded Zoho Forms, prefilled and authoritative; progress on Forms webhook only.

name: Provider Scheduling
description: Collect preferences, confirm appointments, and lock progression until attended.

name: Evidence Package Build
description: Assemble signed forms, MDBQs, lay statements, STRs, and civilian records into a single packet.

name: Final Review & Delivery Support
description: Validate completeness, secondary conditions, and exposures before filing guidance.

name: Submit (Veteran-led)
description: Guide the veteran through VA.gov submission; TYFYS is not the VA or a VSO.

name: Decision & Follow-up
description: Capture outcomes, surface next steps, and update CRM without altering legacy pipelines.
